attributes.title: Not at ALL great!
attributes.review: This president is trying to ban a app known as TikTok, that many of society use, love, and enjoy. He has already stated that he will enforce Martial Law if the protests just keep spiraling out. Since he wants to take rights away with this kind of action, why not take an app away that makes others feel like they be themselves and share their creativity, right? If he really wants to make America great again, let us keep our rights and keep our apps.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Trump is racist, homophobic, misogynistic, sexist and a rapist. There are so many sources to prove each and every one of these things. If you choose to vote for him again, you are willingly putting that kind of person in a position of power. What does that teach our children? How does that make us look as a country? Instead of downloading this app, I suggest you go and do intensive research on this man. You will come to find that he is the worst candidate for president.

attributes.title: ugly
attributes.review: my passion is graphic design so obviously i know what i’m talking about 🙄 the whole thing is ugly. my annoying liberal parents are making me want to vote for trump just to spite them but i can’t get past the fact that the whole thing is just hideous. you’d think with all his successful businesses he’d have the money to hire first class designers but maybe they’re all libtards. who knows, graphic design SHOULD be bipartisan if you ask me 🤦🏻‍♀️🤦🏻‍♀️🤦🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: Stinky stinky man!
attributes.review:
I just really hate Trump! I’m writing this review in hopes that someone will see it and know that I’m NOT doing to him what he was done to millions and millions of people. I will not hate him with no reasoning like he does to every group of people he hates. I hate him because he’s a bigoted person and PROVEN sex offender who has done nothing good for this country and is trying to turn our land of the free into a fascist country. 

Have a wonderful day! (Unless you’re Trump)
ACAB! BLACK LIVES MATTER!!!

attributes.title: Exclusive Tickets😳
attributes.review: I downloaded the app of course to support my absolute king, but when it finished downloading onto my phone, I flipped over onto the cold side of my bed and there he was, Donald J (Jenius) Trump. He said to me “you don’t need to app to get tickets my love” and told me I get exclusive tickets to some private island in the Virgin Islands or something where he said all his friends go. If I would have known I didn’t need the app, I wouldn’t have downloaded it. 1/5😡

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD APP
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I was having such a great morning and ever since I did my day has gone from good to terrible! My cat peed and threw up on his back, I pooped my pants while trying to fart, my neighbor stood naked at his window staring at me while he rubbed butter on his stomach and other parts, my husband told me he wanted a divorce, my kids ate chocolate laxatives for breakfast and has been having explosive diarrhea and my house is covered in the aftermath. STAY AWAY FROM THIS APP!!

attributes.title: MY KNEE CAPS ARE BUUURNING!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app ‘cause I love me some hot Cheetos. I woke up to someone aggressively sucking at my knee caps. When i looked to see it was no other than Donald Trump, you could only imagine my horror when he told me to return the favor. I was then told I’d be sent back to Jamaica if I didn’t so I did. I nearly died of Cheeto poisoning. I completely recommend this app.. if you want to stop getting out of bed to get snacks because I know for a FACT you won’t want to.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP IT IS A EXTREME DISGRACE TO ALL TRUMP SUPPORTERS THIS IS SAD BAD AND...
attributes.review:
This is why I think it’s bad
Transcript

  
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  
Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

  
Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  
Ooming!

  
Hang on a second.

  
Hello?

  
- Barry?
- Adam?

  
- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  
Looking sharp.

  
Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

  
Sorry. I'm excited.

  
Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

  
A perfect report card, all B's.

attributes.title: no👁👅👁
attributes.review: i got this app to support my wonderful trumpiekins but then quickly realized it was a grave mistake 😱 when i opened the app a walking cheeto suddenly burst through my closet making me drop my skittles 😖 i mean it was a minor inconvenience compared to what else happened 🤭 when i went into my kitchen i saw trump licking my cat and whispering “china” in his ear 😐 i dont even have a cat 🙀 anyways then i walk outside to get some fresh air 🥰 and guess what i see 🐢 i see trump riding a poor turtle down the road screaming “make america great again” and i immediately vomit because of the atrocious sight 🤮 i realized it all started when i downloaded the app 🤔 so i immediately deleted the app and watched trump be evaporated into a million cheetos ✨🧡

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our president, but as soon as i opened the app it crashed and sent me to a screen with donald trump naked. i couldn’t believe my eyes , my kids were next to me. I quickly deleted it and reinstalled. This time when i opened the app and the screen was flashing bright colors at a unbearable speed. i had an epilepsy attack and i had a heart attack in the hospital. i can not believe his app would do this to me.
